notes.text:
rubygem-rack was updated to fix one security issue.

This security issue was fixed:
- CVE-2015-3225: Crafted requests could have caused a SystemStackError leading to Denial of Service (bsc#934797).
notes.title: Description of the patch

full_product_name.name: rubygem-rack-1.1.6-0.11.2.x86_64 as component of SUSE Lifecycle Management Server 1.3

notes.text: lib/rack/utils.rb in Rack before 1.5.4 and 1.6.x before 1.6.2, as used with Ruby on Rails 3.x and 4.x and other products, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (SystemStackError) via a request with a large parameter depth.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
